A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For the people who are upset by this movie:  relax\, and may the Force be with you.  This is the epitome of a middle movie in a trilogy\, and I like Johnson's approach to the complex natures for the major characters.  Where Chapter iV was about black-and-white good vs. evil\, this feels more like real relationships and the how people face their failures.  I trust that Abrams will bring this story home with a flourish in the next movie and people will appreciate how well The Last Jedi made this a deeper story with richer characters.
